subject: Re: [junit] EJB Testing
msgSnippet: ... Someone has to promote the book. It ll die on its own if I don t. :) -- J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger :: http://www.jbrains.ca Your guide to software
messageBody:
Joe Schmetzer wrote:

> Congratulations Vince! Your question has provoked a response from 3 book
> authors (so far). We should start keeping score :-)

Someone has to promote the book. It'll die on its own if I don't. :)
